resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104482</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104482</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208669</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Music Conducting: Classroom Activities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik-Leiten: Klassenzimmer-Aktivitäten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conduite de Musique : Activités de Salle de
classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conduzir Da Música: Atividades Da Sala de 
aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Condotta Di Musica: Attività Dell'Aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική που διευθύνει: Δραστηριότητες τάξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Conducir De la Música: Actividades De la
Sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Contains music conducting activities, for use with grades k-8, to practice keeping steady rhythm, work on leadership and cooperation, learn about meter, and learn what a conductor does.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthält Musikleitaktivitäten, für Gebrauch mit 
Graden k-8, unveränderlichen, Rhythmus, Arbeit über Führung und 
Mitarbeit zu halten zu üben, über Meßinstrument zu erlernen und zu 
erlernen, was ein Leiter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contient des activités de conduite de musique, 
pour l'usage avec les catégories k-8, de pratiquer garder le rythme 
régulier, le travail sur la conduite et la coopération, de se 
renseigner sur le mètre, et d'apprendre ce qu'un conducteur .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Contem atividades conduzindo da música, para o 
uso com classes k-8, praticar manter o ritmo constante, o trabalho na 
liderança e a cooperação, aprender sobre o medidor, e aprender o 
que um condutor .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Contiene le attività di condotta di musica, per 
uso con i gradi k-8, esercitarsi in mantenere il ritmo costante, il 
lavoro su direzione e la cooperazione, imparare circa il tester ed 
imparare che cosa un conduttore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιέχει τη μουσική διευθύνοντας τις δραστηριότητες, 
για τη χρήση με τους βαθμούς Κ-8, στην πρακτική που κρατά το 
σταθερό ρυθμό, την εργασία για την ηγεσία και τη συνεργασία, 
μαθαίνει για το μετρητή, και μαθαίνει τι ένας αγωγός κάνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contiene actividades que conducen de la música, 
para el uso con los grados k-8, de practicar el guardar de ritmo 
constante, del trabajo sobre la dirección y de la cooperación, de 
aprender sobre el contador, y de aprender lo que lo hace un conductor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208669</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104482</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/music-conducting-classroom-activities</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
